996850.name: Vip Em Up - The action movies stars beat em up Ep.0 ( beta )
996850.description:
Vip em up game let you to play an old style beat em up game using as character many famous stars of action movies.

MAny episodes will be realesed little by little together with new characters.

So...what are you waiting for ? Beat all em up !!!!!!

At the moment the controller is only set on keyboard:

Arrows ---- move caracter
Z ---- Punch
X ---- Kick
C ---- Block
Space ---- Jump
Esc ---- restart ( also when character died )
Q ---- Quit to Windows
